name: BOMBS vr
description:
Bombs is a quest 2 virtual reality game retro platformer. You have the power to create bombs, in a brick and stone maze like world with strange creatures that you must destroy to escape. Explore 32 levels and relive the nostalgia of 8 bit games in a new exciting vr adventure.  

NOTE: I found that if using sidequest to install you have to set the read and write permissions to true under manage games for saves to work.
